name: T - Sonia Layla
_source: speak;Sonia; I'm talking to you, little lady!{w} You shouldn't be in the middle of a battle like this!{w} You could get hurt.
speak;Layla; Hell no, I'm not going to hide, and I'm not a little lady!{w} I can use dark magic from beyond our world!
speak;Sonia; When you say it like that, it sounds so adorable!{w}{c:expression;Sonia;NoSmile} Seriously, lie low somewhere while the big girls clean up.
speak;Layla; Hmph, I'll teach her not to talk down to me like that{tgm}...
